THE LIGHT WALK
Year 2020
Location Canton, MA
Industry Footwear
Category E-commerce Website
Services

Website Design

Development

Support

Visit site

Client

The Light Walk, Inc. is the industry leader in Orthopedic Shoes.

Challenge

The Light Walk wanted to elevate their online presense in order to drive traffic and conversions.

Objectives

- Fully responsive Website
- Optimize Website for Faster Page Speed Load
- Integrate Multi Channel Marketplace
- Integrate Automated Review System
- Integrate Elastic search
- Unique presentation of the products & Quick Cart

Solution

Create simple , fast and easy to navigate website. Integrate 3rd Party solutions to automate tasks and spread online brand awareness. Emphasis was also put on the content and SEO optimization in order to rank higher in search results.

Impact

The combination of clutter free website with better user experice ui we have seen less cart abandoment, better user retention and overall increase in user browse time and traffic. With M2EPro and Yotpo integration TLW has increased their overall sales, expanded their brand awareness and increased their traffic The conversion rate has increased, among other things, by optimizing SEO, Content, Quick Cart and Social login. Product filtering With thousands of products and technical specifications, allowing customers to filter products by attributes was crucial. Using AJAX technology to provide filtering functionality allowed us to eliminate duplicate content and build the site as SEO-friendly as possible. Elasticsearch extension improved storeâ€™s search results and lets customers perform search of any kind.

Results

During 6 month after launch

Increase in convertion rate

20% Number of customers from the website increased by Pages viewed per session increased by Average session duration increased by Bounce rate decreased twofold

Increase in user engagement.

30%

Home page load time

0.5 seconds faster

Mobile-friendly

Fully responsive

Third-Party Integrations

M2EPro, Yotpo, Elastic Search
